players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob, why did you choose to investigate Charlie last night? That might help us decide."
Charlie: "Bob, you could have been investigating any of us. Why specifically Charlie?"
Diana: "Bob, you still haven’t explained why you chose to investigate Charlie. Please clarify so we can make an informed decision."
You: "I investigated Charlie based on my initial gut feeling during the setup. He's the mafioso, so we need to vote him out to save the town."
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafioso and we should vote for him to protect the town."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they are the mafioso. We should vote for them to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob, why did you choose to investigate Charlie last night? That might help us decide."
You: "Bob, you could have been investigating any of us. Why specifically Charlie?"
Diana: "Bob, you still haven’t explained why you chose to investigate Charlie. Please clarify so we can make an informed decision."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie based on my initial gut feeling during the setup. He's the mafioso, so we need to vote him out to save the town."
You: "I think Bob is the mafioso and we should vote for him to protect the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
